original_title: Tinkerbell's Learn Ballet Step by Step
overview: Tinkerbell Dance Studio is a dance series for kids that teaches basic introductory steps to beginner level dancers. The variety of DVDs in this series were specifically designed so every child can find a dance genre that excites them. This series is perfect for ages 4 and up, and with step-by-step instructions & easy-to-learn steps, children will look and feel like real dancers in no time!
title: Tinkerbell's Learn Ballet Step by Step
